DOC.brief_summary: Pregabalin 150mg placebo administer 1 hour preoperatively patient undergo partial hepatectomy . Postoperatively , patient receive morphine rescue analgesic . Morphine consumption first 48 hour document . Postoperative pain measure visual analogue scale ( VAS ) score .
DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Pain Control Liver Surgery Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : In Randomized Controlled Trial , patient undergo partial hepatectomy administer single pre-operative dose Pregabalin placebo . Primary endpoint follow : - Post-operative analgesic requirement - Post-operative VAS scale ( rat 0-10 ) - Complications - Post-operative antiemetic requirement - Length stay
DOC.criteria: patient undergo partial hepatectomy contraindication pregabalin creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl GGT > 165 , AST > 105 , ALT > 135 peptic Ulcus haemorrhagic diathesis angina pectoris , myocardial infarction stroke bronchial asthma opioid abuse
